# Steps to reproduce
Archlinux 4.20.12-arch1-1-ARCH
yaourt -Syu powershell Installs version 6.1.3

get-module -listavailable 

no PowerShellGet, no PackageManagement

Was able to install PakageManagement Manually, cannot install PowerShellGet manually.  If I do I get errors when trying to install modules from gallery. 

# Expected behavior

Documentation insists that these modules are part of the base build. 

```

# Actual behavior

```No Modules can be installed from the Gallery or really from anywhere unless done manually```
Tab completion and history appear to be broken on my install as well
# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

6      1      3                      

# Edit
installing the aur debian binary package works.  I will look at the compile config of that aur package and see if there are any additional options required in the build

title: PackageManagement and PowerShellGet missing from Linux build, tab completion failing
